lead_paragraph: Germany coach Joachim Loew will not be celebrating the 20th anniversary of his team's golden goal over the Czech Republic in the Euro 1996 final, having heard the story far too many times from its scorer Oliver Bierhoff.

headline.print_headline: No More Golden Goal Stories Please, Loew Tells Bierhoff
headline.main: No More Golden Goal Stories Please, Loew Tells Bierhoff

snippet: Germany coach Joachim Loew will not be celebrating the 20th anniversary of his team's golden goal over the Czech Republic in the Euro 1996 final, having heard the story far too many times from its scorer Oliver Bierhoff....
